Literature.Title: Chemical Synthesis and Structure-Activity Relationship Study Yield Desotamide a Analogues with Improved Antibacterial Activity.
Literature.Author: Xu R, Song Y, Li J, Ju J, Li Q

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus simulans LJH13(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis BS01(MIC=8µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ML01(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus gallinarum LJH11(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus haemolyticus LJH9(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 13124(MIC=128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>128µg/ml)
